nodes.name: start

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Alert severity is {{ Alert.severity }} with {{ Alert.count }} failures. Threshold is {{ Alert.threshold }}. Analyze if escalation is needed.

nodes.title: Alert detected: {{ Alert.count }} failures in {{ Alert.service }}

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Check if Alert.count ({{ Alert.count }}) exceeds Alert.threshold ({{ Alert.threshold }}). Set Response.escalated to true if it does.

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Based on Alert.severity being {{ Alert.severity }} and Response.escalated status, determine appropriate action and set Response.action (options: 'auto-heal', 'notify-team', 'escalate-oncall')

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Execute the {{ Response.action }} action for service {{ Alert.service }}
